DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To investigate VLDL-TG metabolism in exercise in healthy volunteers to determine the contribution of VLDL-TG in exercise and eventual gender differences
DOC.brief_title: Very Low Density Lipoprotein (VLDL) Triglyceride Metabolism in Exercise
DOC.criteria: Healthy Age: 2050 years Premenopausal Smoking Alcohol abuse Use of medications
